Theorem 2.2.Let $A$ be as in (2.1) and (2.2). If $u\in\mathcal{C}^{2}$ ,then 
$$
\|u\|_{C}\leq\operatorname*{max}{\big\{}|u(0)|,|u(1)|{\big\}}+C\|A u\|_{C}.
$$
The constant $C$ depends on the coefficients of $\boldsymbol{A}$ butnoton $u$

$$
